exercises.name: Standard Push-Ups
exercises.description: Place hands shoulder-width apart and lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.
instructions: Start in a high plank position with hands shoulder-width apart
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor
Push back up to the starting position
Repeat for 45-60 seconds

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.description: Lower your body by bending your knees as if sitting in a chair, then return to standing.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Keep your chest up and back straight
Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back
Go as low as comfortable, ideally until thighs are parallel to the floor
Push through your heels to return to standing
Repeat for 45-60 seconds

exercises.name: Standard Plank
exercises.description: Hold a push-up position with your weight on your forearms.
instructions: Start on your forearms and toes
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
Engage your core and don't let your hips sag
Hold the position for 30-60 seconds
Breathe normally throughout

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Jump while spreading your legs and bringing your arms above your head.
instructions: Start standing with feet together and arms at your sides
Jump up, spreading your feet beyond shoulder width
Simultaneously raise your arms above your head
Jump again, returning to the starting position
Repeat at a brisk pace for 45-60 seconds

exercises.name: Forward Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward and lower your body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Take a step forward with one leg
Lower your body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees
Push through your front heel to return to the starting position
Repeat with the other leg
Continue alternating for 45-60 seconds

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: From a push-up position, alternate bringing your knees toward your chest.
instructions: Start in a push-up position with arms straight
Bring one knee toward your chest
Quickly switch legs, bringing the other knee forward
Continue alternating at a brisk pace
Keep your hips down and core engaged
Repeat for 30-45 seconds

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.description: Lie on your back and alternate bringing elbow to opposite knee.
instructions: Lie on your back with hands behind your head
Lift your shoulders off the ground and bring knees to a tabletop position
Extend one leg while rotating your torso to bring the opposite elbow toward the bent knee
Switch sides in a fluid motion, like pedaling a bicycle
Continue alternating for 30-45 seconds

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.description: Lie on your back and lift your hips toward the ceiling.
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor
Place arms at your sides with palms down
Push through your heels to lift your hips toward the ceiling
Squeeze your glutes at the top
Lower back down with control
Repeat for 30-45 seconds

exercises.name: Chair Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Using a chair or desk, lower your body to work your triceps.
instructions: Sit on the edge of a sturdy chair or desk
Place your hands on the edge of the surface, fingers pointing forward
Slide your butt off the edge with legs extended
Lower your body by bending your elbows
Push back up until arms are straight
Repeat for 30-45 seconds

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.description: Press your back against a wall and hold a seated position.
instructions: Stand with your back against a wall
Walk your feet out and slide down until your thighs are parallel to the floor
Knees should be directly above ankles
Keep your back flat against the wall
Hold the position for 30-60 seconds
Breathe normally throughout

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
exercises.description: Curl dumbbells upward while keeping elbows close to torso.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding dumbbells at your sides
Keep your elbows close to your torso
Curl the weights upward while keeping your upper arms stationary
Continue curling until the dumbbells are at shoulder level
Slowly lower the weights back to the starting position
Repeat for 30-45 seconds

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: Swing a kettlebell between your legs and up to chest height.
instructions: Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder-width apart
Hold kettlebell with both hands in front of you
Hinge at the hips and swing the kettlebell between your legs
Thrust your hips forward to swing the kettlebell up to chest height
Let the kettlebell naturally fall back down
Repeat for 30-45 seconds
